title: devworkup
author: devworkup
content: We are looking for support specialists to support DEX in Telegram chats and Live chat on the site.Requirements:- Knowledge of English not lower than B2;- Experience in crypto, DeFi, DEX;- Experience in Metamask, Trust Wallet etc.- Work experience as a support manager in crypto projects from 3 months;- Ability to respond competently and politely in English;- Responsibility;Conditions:- Pay per week- 8 hour schedule- Bonus at the end of each working month- Opportunity for growthTelegram: @ussss242362
